attributes.action: assign the hunting act to the archives of disasterous policies and allow hunting with dogs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gordon Brown could do a lot of good to his party and to win votes by repealing the hunting act that tony blair allowed ,it would show he was listenning to country people.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
